title: Rare Supermoon Is Going to Unleash Tidal Waves and Massive Earthquakes
subtitle: Scientists have been debating a connection between lunar cycles and earthquakes for decades, but not one of them has suggested that next week’s supermoon is going to be an apocalyptic harbinger of mayhem.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Scientists say that largest the supermoon since 1948, occurring on 14 November 2016, will trigger tidal waves and catastrophic earthquakes, wreaking havoc across the planet.
